TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from satisfied users who love our food building app!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my meal planning and preparation. I can easily design new recipes and get creative with ingredients.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I rely on this app to conceptualize and test new dish ideas before bringing them to the kitchen.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm meal prepping for the week or throwing an intricate dinner party, this app helps me build flavorful, visually appealing plates.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our food building app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What can I build with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to virtually construct any type of food item - from simple sandwiches to elaborate multi-course meals. Get creative and design your dream dish!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! The app is designed for everyone from novice cooks to professional chefs. It's a fun way to experiment with food combinations without any mess.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Once you've built your virtual food masterpiece, you can easily share photos and recipes with friends through social media or email.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a cost to use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The basic app is free to download and use. We offer optional in-app purchases for premium ingredients and advanced cooking tools.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Just download the app and let your culinary creativity run wild! Our beginner tutorials will guide you through the basics of virtual food construction.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Craft delectable dishes with our intuitive food building app.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing a revolutionary way to plan and prepare meals.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Craft delicious dishes with ease using our intuitive food building app. Explore endless recipe combinations and bring your kitchen adventures to life.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to your Kitchen Account
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_GOOGLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEX: Sign Up with your Google Account
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your culinary creativity with CookingPal - the ultimate app for building mouthwatering dishes and exploring new flavors. From tried-and-true family recipes to cutting-edge fusion cuisine, we've got you covered. Join our vibrant community of food enthusiasts and elevate your cooking game today!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Access a vast library of ingredients for crafting delicious recipes. Search by name, category, or dietary restrictions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Easily construct new recipes by combining ingredients. Get nutritional info and tweak portions for perfect results.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Plan out meals for the week or month. Generate shopping lists based on your planned recipes and dietary needs.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Join a vibrant community of food lovers. Share your recipes, get inspiration from others, and discover new culinary delights.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Ran out of an ingredient? Our smart substitution engine suggests suitable alternatives based on flavor profiles and nutrition.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Step-by-step guides for various cooking techniques. Learn to master skills like baking, grilling, and food preparation.
CTA_BODY: Discover a world of delectable possibilities with our app designed for building foods. Explore unique ingredients, experiment with flavors, and craft mouthwatering dishes that tantalize your taste buds.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Share your culinary journey with friends
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get In Touch With Food Builders
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's create your next culinary masterpiece together!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Start with a tasty bite to whet your appetite
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: The star of your culinary creation
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Complement your main with a delicious accompaniment
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Indulge your sweet tooth with a decadent treat
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Quench your thirst with a refreshing sip
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Garnish your meal with extra flavors
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: FoodBuilder is a revolutionary app that allows you to design and build your own customized foods from scratch using a simple drag-and-drop interface. Explore endless ingredient combinations and craft unique culinary creations.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Simply open the app, select your desired ingredients from our extensive library, and arrange them in the virtual workspace. Adjust quantities, flavors, and textures to your liking. Once done, save your food design for future reference or share with others.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of foods can I build?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The possibilities are endless! From reimagined classics to wildly creative concoctions, you can build anything from entrees and desserts to snacks and beverages. Let your culinary creativity run free!
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, FoodBuilder is completely free to download and use. However, some premium ingredient packs and advanced features may require a small fee. But the core app experience is available at no cost.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Unleash your culinary creativity with our app. Design mouthwatering dishes from scratch or explore our vast recipe library.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Get tailored suggestions based on your dietary preferences, cuisine interests, and past favorites.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Easily add ingredients to your digital cart and have them delivered to your doorstep for effortless meal prep.
